Title: Norte, the End of History
Writer: Rody Vera, Lav Diaz, Rody Vera (story), Michiko Yamamoto (story), Raymond Lee (story)
Actors: Sid Lucero, Archie Alemania, Angeli Bayani, Mailes Kanapi
Plot: An embittered law student commits a brutal double murder; a family man takes the fall and is forced into a harsh prison sentence; a mother and her two children wander the countryside looking for some kind of redemption.
